name: Arcane mess
description:
Recomended instalation and launch way

  1. unzip archive
  2. Create a local network (recommended) using Radmin VPN www.radmin-vpn.com/ (or another program) 
  3.  Create a local server
  4.  Ask a friend to connect to your server 
  5.  Launch the game using the .exe file 
  6.  Host game 
  7.  Ask a friend to enter your IP (specified in Radmin VPN and click the join button)

Control

WASD - movement

1,2,3 - magic element buttons

Space - Jump

L Shift - Dash

Left Mouse - cast a spell (when you have 3 magic elements in row)

Magic Combinations:

Magic spellCombinationDescriptionFireballFFFCreates a fireball. The spell deals heavy damage and knocks back the enemy.IceBallIIICreates a frost sphere. The spell deals medium damage and slows the enemy by 50% for 3 second.Arcane boltsAAACreates 4 magic arrows. The spell deals minor damage and burns the enemy's mana (15 mana per hit).Ice circleIIACreates 3 magic circles (one after the other) at the point of contact with any surface. Upon entering the affected area, the player takes damage and is slowed by 50% for 3 seconds.Fire LaunchFFIThrows the caster up. This spell allows you to climb high ledges and maneuver.Fire TornadoFFASpawns a fire tornado that throws the character up and deals middle damage.Сard shufflingFIASwaps the order of the enemy's magic elements randomly.Static shockFIICreates an electrical impulse that, on hit, deals minor damage and has a 80% chance to stun the enemy for 2 seconds.Fire hammerFAIA fiery hammer that moves quickly but pushes the enemy far away. Relatively little damage, but a strong push.Ice BombIAICreates a slow moving block of ice that deals massive damage and slows by 50% for 3 seconds.SilenceAIFForbids casting anything except Dash for 3 seconds.Mana BurnAAFCreates a zone in which the player quickly loses mana.
